doc.description: Compile and control the settings of the Bebop front and bottom cameras.

define.name: RESOLUTION
define.description: Preset image resolutions, 0 = VGA, 1 = 720p, 2 = 720p 4:3 aspect ratio, 3 = 1080p, 4 = 1080p 4:3 aspect ratio, 5 = 2048*2048, this is the max dimention allowable with isp

define.name: OUTPUT_WIDTH
define.description: Image horizontal resolution used if MT9F002_RESOLUTION not defined

define.name: OUTPUT_HEIGHT
define.description: Image vertical resolution used if MT9F002_RESOLUTION not defined

define.name: OFFSET_X
define.description: Signed fractional offset from centre of image of original sensor [-0.5,0.5]

define.name: OFFSET_Y
define.description: Signed fractional offset from centre of image of original sensor [-0.5,0.5]

define.name: ZOOM
define.description: Zoom factor of image

define.name: TARGET_EXPOSURE
define.description: Exposure of the front camera of the bebop. Experimental values: Outside: 15; Inside well lit: 30; Inside poorly lit: 60

define.name: TARGET_FPS
define.description: Desired frame rate

define.name: GAIN_GREEN1
define.description: Green gain

define.description: Green gain

define.name: GAIN_RED
define.description: Red gain

define.name: GAIN_BLUE
define.description: Blue gain

define.name: FOCAL_X
define.description: Focal length in the x-direction in pixels

define.name: CENTER_X
